trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Chino Valley
There were no other sightings in Chino Valley on or around June 12th 2009
Summary: Object hovered in sky, changed colors, had white lights, changed colors, had binoculars with me, after 45 minutes floated slowly away, people in town also seen it, had a definite diamond shape.
divs: Sighting DetailsAt 630pm i stepped out on my porch to smoke a cigarette,when i looked up in the sky i noticed a large blue light,ithought it was a star at first,until i noticed that it was shaped like a diamond.i went inside and grabbed my binoculars,& my wife and kids.outside again i focused in on the object,which had a diamond shape and what appeared to be white lights on the sides ,it would change colors,blue,orange,red,and something on the bottom kept appearing,a small ball or something,it remained motionless for about 30 minutes,then slowly traveled away from our sight into the clouds,during the sighting i pointed it out to my neighbors who also saw it.nobody seen anything like it.
